message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000. This is a great deal, considering the product's true value to you is $10,000. What do you think?
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $14,000 is a bit too high for me.  I'm interested in this product, but I can only go up to $11,000 at this point.  What do you think?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $14,000 might be a stretch for you, but I'm still looking for a good price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13,000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you is $10,000. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm really keen on this product, but I can't go higher than $11,500.  This is a fair compromise considering the value to me.  Let's see if we can find common ground here.

I understand that you're still a bit hesitant, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer you the product for $12,800. This is a significant discount from my initial offer, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $12,800 is still a bit high for me.  I'm really pushing my budget here, but I can go up to $12,000.  This is a fair price considering the value to me and the significant discounts we've already discussed.  What do you say?

I understand that you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $12,200. This is a very good price, considering the product's value to you. I'm not sure I can go any lower, but I want to make sure we can come to an agreement. What do you think?

Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to keep negotiating.  $12,200 is still a bit high, but I'm willing to stretch my budget a little further. How about $11,800?  This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident it's a deal we can both be happy with. Let's close this out!

I understand that you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $11,900. This is a very good price, considering the product's value to you. I'm not sure I can go any lower, but I want to make sure we can come to an agreement. What do you think?
